product_name: New Balance 890V3 Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built to meet the demands of world-class runners, the New Balance 890V3 Running Shoes for women are lightweight and fast, mile after mile. ABZORB(R) Crash Pads allow enhanced motion control and stability within the heel. Innovative REVlite midsole provides premium responsiveness and durability at a 30% lighter weight than other foams with comparable performance. Ndurance(R) rubber compound offers maximum outsole durability. New Balance 890V3 Running Shoes for women are designed with blown rubber outsoles, no-sew overlays in optimal areas and thin thermoplastic urethane welds for maximum comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Built to meet the demands of world-class runners, the New Balance 890V3 Running Shoes for women are lightweight and fast, mile after mile.
